alert.note: Alert for Fresno-Tulare Lower Sierra; Grant Grove Area; Kings Canyon NP; Sequoia NP (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 11 at 2:28PM PST by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...A thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Tulare and east central Fresno Counties through 300 PM PST... At 227 PM PST, Doppler radar was tracking a thunderstorm 22 miles north of Three Rivers, or 34 miles southwest of South Lake, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Sentinel Campground, Canyon View Campground, State Lakes, Monarch Ranger Station, Park Ridge, Cedar Grove, Azalea Campground, Mitchell Meadow, Roaring River Ranger Station, Grant Grove, Crystal Springs Campground, Big Meadows, Moraine Campground, Sheep Creek Campground, Sunset Campground, Hume Lake and Grant Grove Visitor Center. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Fresno-Tulare Lower Sierra; Grant Grove Area; Kings Canyon NP; Sequoia NP
